name: Project_C
description:
When I woke up, it was a long tunnel.

I have to get out of here. But you must defeat those who are blocking the way.

If you fall down here, you go back to the tunnel. From the beginning...

/

I like Cyberpunk background. I wanted to make a game like that, and I wanted to make a game like RogueLike.The games are all in four stages.(One Start Stage)

When each stage is cleared, there are three random levels of capability and you can choose one of them.

This game I made was influenced by 'Hades' and 'Dead Cell'. (My favorite game)

It is a game that I want to complete if I have a chance, although it is very short and simple to make in a short time, and there may be bugs.

MarketPlace Asset
-Frank RPG Gunslinger(Animation)
-Frank Assassin (Ninja) (Animation)
-Cyberpunk Industries Vol.1 (Map)
-Weapon Master (Sound)
-Futuristic Combat Weapons(Sound)
-Cyberpunk Samurai (Character)
-Paragon(Gadget/Character)
-Paragon(Murdock/Character)
